verses.english: Do ye indeed speak righteousness, O congregation? do ye judge uprightly, O ye sons of men?

derivation: a primitive root;  also as denominative from H5331 (נֶצַח)
strongs_def: properly, to glitter from afar, i.e. to be eminent (as a superintendent, especially of the Temple services and its music); to be permanent
gloss: excel, chief musician (singer), oversee(-r), set forward.

strongs_def: 'Thou must not destroy'; probably the opening words to a popular song
gloss: Al-taschith.

strongs_def: 'Thou must not destroy'; probably the opening words to a popular song
gloss: Al-taschith.

derivation: rarely (fully); דָּוִיד; from the same as H1730 (דּוֹד); loving;
strongs_def: David, the youngest son of Jesse
gloss: David.

strongs_def: an engraving, i.e. (techn.) a poem
gloss: Michtam.

strongs_def: {verily}
gloss: in (very) deed; of a surety.

strongs_def: silence (i.e. mute justice)
gloss: congregation. Compare H3128 (יוֹנַת אֵלֶם רְחֹקִים).

strongs_def: the right (natural, moral or legal); also (abstractly) equity or (figuratively) prosperity
gloss: [idiom] even, ([idiom] that which is altogether) just(-ice), (un-)right(-eous) (cause, -ly, -ness).

strongs_def: perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak; rarely (in a destructive sense) to subdue
gloss: answer, appoint, bid, command, commune, declare, destroy, give, name, promise, pronounce, rehearse, say, speak, be spokesman, subdue, talk, teach, tell, think, use (entreaties), utter, [idiom] well, [idiom] work.

strongs_def: evenness, i.e. (figuratively) prosperity or concord; also straightness, i.e. (figuratively) rectitude (only in plural with singular sense; often adverbially)
gloss: agreement, aright, that are equal, equity, (things that are) right(-eously, things), sweetly, upright(-ly, -ness).

strongs_def: to judge, i.e. pronounce sentence (for or against); by implication, to vindicate or punish; by extenssion, to govern; passively, to litigate (literally or figuratively)
gloss: [phrase] avenge, [idiom] that condemn, contend, defend, execute (judgment), (be a) judge(-ment), [idiom] needs, plead, reason, rule.

strongs_def: a son (as a builder of the family name), in the widest sense (of literal and figurative relationship, including grandson, subject, nation, quality or condition, etc., (like father or brother), etc.)
gloss: [phrase] afflicted, age, (Ahoh-) (Ammon-) (Hachmon-) (Lev-) ite, (anoint-) ed one, appointed to, ([phrase]) arrow, (Assyr-) (Babylon-) (Egypt-) (Grec-) ian, one born, bough, branch, breed, [phrase] (young) bullock, [phrase] (young) calf, [idiom] came up in, child, colt, [idiom] common, [idiom] corn, daughter, [idiom] of first, [phrase] firstborn, foal, [phrase] very fruitful, [phrase] postage, [idiom] in, [phrase] kid, [phrase] lamb, ([phrase]) man, meet, [phrase] mighty, [phrase] nephew, old, ([phrase]) people, [phrase] rebel, [phrase] robber, [idiom] servant born, [idiom] soldier, son, [phrase] spark, [phrase] steward, [phrase] stranger, [idiom] surely, them of, [phrase] tumultuous one, [phrase] valiant(-est), whelp, worthy, young (one), youth.

strongs_def: ruddy i.e. a human being (an individual or the species, mankind, etc.)
gloss: [idiom] another, [phrase] hypocrite, [phrase] common sort, [idiom] low, man (mean, of low degree), person.

verses.header: ¶ To the chief Musician, Altaschith, Michtam of David.

verses.english: Yea, in heart ye work wickedness; ye weigh the violence of your hands in the earth.

strongs_def: meaning accession (used as an adverb or conjunction); also or yea; adversatively though
gloss: also, [phrase] although, and (furthermore, yet), but, even, [phrase] how much less (more, rather than), moreover, with, yea.

strongs_def: the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
gloss: [phrase] care for, comfortably, consent, [idiom] considered, courag(-eous), friend(-ly), ((broken-), (hard-), (merry-), (stiff-), (stout-), double) heart(-ed), [idiom] heed, [idiom] I, kindly, midst, mind(-ed), [idiom] regard(-ed), [idiom] themselves, [idiom] unawares, understanding, [idiom] well, willingly, wisdom.

derivation: or עָוֶל; and (feminine) עַוְלָה; or עוֹלָה; or עֹלָה; from H5765 (עֲוַל);
strongs_def: (moral) evil
gloss: iniquity, perverseness, unjust(-ly), unrighteousness(-ly); wicked(-ness).

strongs_def: to do or make (systematically and habitually), especially to practise
gloss: commit, (evil-) do(-er), make(-r), ordain, work(-er).

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to be firm;
strongs_def: the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
gloss: [idiom] common, country, earth, field, ground, land, [idiom] natins, way, [phrase] wilderness, world.

strongs_def: violence; by implication, wrong; by meton. unjust gain
gloss: cruel(-ty), damage, false, injustice, [idiom] oppressor, unrighteous, violence (against, done), violent (dealing), wrong.

derivation: a primitive word; in distinction from H3709 (כַּף), the closed one); used (as noun, adverb, etc.) in a great variety of applications, both literally and figuratively, both proximate and remote (as follows)
strongs_def: a hand (the open one (indicating power, means, direction, etc.),
gloss: ([phrase] be) able, [idiom] about, [phrase] armholes, at, axletree, because of, beside, border, [idiom] bounty, [phrase] broad, (broken-) handed, [idiom] by, charge, coast, [phrase] consecrate, [phrase] creditor, custody, debt, dominion, [idiom] enough, [phrase] fellowship, force, [idiom] from, hand(-staves, -y work), [idiom] he, himself, [idiom] in, labour, [phrase] large, ledge, (left-) handed, means, [idiom] mine, ministry, near, [idiom] of, [idiom] order, ordinance, [idiom] our, parts, pain, power, [idiom] presumptuously, service, side, sore, state, stay, draw with strength, stroke, [phrase] swear, terror, [idiom] thee, [idiom] by them, [idiom] themselves, [idiom] thine own, [idiom] thou, through, [idiom] throwing, [phrase] thumb, times, [idiom] to, [idiom] under, [idiom] us, [idiom] wait on, (way-) side, where, [phrase] wide, [idiom] with (him, me, you), work, [phrase] yield, [idiom] yourselves.

strongs_def: properly, to roll flat, i.e. prepare (a road); also to revolve, i.e. weigh (mentally)
gloss: make, ponder, weigh.

verses.english: The wicked are estranged from the womb: they go astray as soon as they be born, speaking lies.

strongs_def: to turn aside (especially for lodging); hence to be aforeigner, strange, profane; specifically (active participle) to commit adultery
gloss: (come from) another (man, place), fanner, go away, (e-) strange(-r, thing, woman).

strongs_def: morally wrong; concretely, an (actively) bad person
gloss: [phrase] condemned, guilty, ungodly, wicked (man), that did wrong.

strongs_def: the womb
gloss: matrix, womb.

strongs_def: to vacillate, i.e. reel or stray (literally or figuratively); also causative of both
gloss: (cause to) go astray, deceive, dissemble, (cause to, make to) err, pant, seduce, (make to) stagger, (cause to) wander, be out of the way.

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to be hollow;
strongs_def: the belly, especially the womb; also the bosom or body of anything
gloss: belly, body, [phrase] as they be born, [phrase] within, womb.

strongs_def: perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak; rarely (in a destructive sense) to subdue
gloss: answer, appoint, bid, command, commune, declare, destroy, give, name, promise, pronounce, rehearse, say, speak, be spokesman, subdue, talk, teach, tell, think, use (entreaties), utter, [idiom] well, [idiom] work.

strongs_def: falsehood; literally (untruth) or figuratively (idol)
gloss: deceitful, false, leasing, + liar, lie, lying.

verses.english: Their poison is like the poison of a serpent: they are like the deaf adder that stoppeth her ear;

strongs_def: heat; figuratively, anger, poison (from its fever)
gloss: anger, bottles, hot displeasure, furious(-ly, -ry), heat, indignation, poison, rage, wrath(-ful). See H2529 (חֶמְאָה).

strongs_def: resemblance; concretely, model, shape; adverbially, like
gloss: fashion, like (-ness, as), manner, similitude.

strongs_def: heat; figuratively, anger, poison (from its fever)
gloss: anger, bottles, hot displeasure, furious(-ly, -ry), heat, indignation, poison, rage, wrath(-ful). See H2529 (חֶמְאָה).

strongs_def: a snake (from its hiss)
gloss: serpent.

strongs_def: a form of the prefix 'k-', but used separately  as, thus, so
gloss: according to, (such) as (it were, well as), in comparison of, like (as, to, unto), thus, when, worth.

derivation: from an unused root meaning to twist;
strongs_def: an asp (from its contortions)
gloss: adder.

strongs_def: deaf (whether literally or spiritual)
gloss: deaf.

strongs_def: to close (the lips or ears); by analology to contract (a window by bevelled jambs)
gloss: narrow, shut, stop.

strongs_def: broadness. i.e. (concrete) the ear (from its form in man)
gloss: [phrase] advertise, audience, [phrase] displease, ear, hearing, [phrase] show.

verses.english: Which will not hearken to the voice of charmers, charming never so wisely.

derivation: a primitive relative pronoun (of every gender and number);
strongs_def: who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
gloss: [idiom] after, [idiom] alike, as (soon as), because, [idiom] every, for, [phrase] forasmuch, [phrase] from whence, [phrase] how(-soever), [idiom] if, (so) that ((thing) which, wherein), [idiom] though, [phrase] until, [phrase] whatsoever, when, where ([phrase] -as, -in, -of, -on, -soever, -with), which, whilst, [phrase] whither(-soever), who(-m, -soever, -se). As it is indeclinable, it is often accompanied by the personal pronoun expletively, used to show the connection.

derivation: or לוֹא; or לֹה; (Deuteronomy 3:11), a primitive particle;
strongs_def: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
gloss: [idiom] before, [phrase] or else, ere, [phrase] except, ig(-norant), much, less, nay, neither, never, no((-ne), -r, (-thing)), ([idiom] as though...,(can-), for) not (out of), of nought, otherwise, out of, [phrase] surely, [phrase] as truly as, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] verily, for want, [phrase] whether, without.

strongs_def: to hear intelligently (often with implication of attention, obedience, etc.; causatively, to tell, etc.)
gloss: [idiom] attentively, call (gather) together, [idiom] carefully, [idiom] certainly, consent, consider, be content, declare, [idiom] diligently, discern, give ear, (cause to, let, make to) hear(-ken, tell), [idiom] indeed, listen, make (a) noise, (be) obedient, obey, perceive, (make a) proclaim(-ation), publish, regard, report, shew (forth), (make a) sound, [idiom] surely, tell, understand, whosoever (heareth), witness.

derivation: or קֹל; from an unused root meaning to call aloud;
strongs_def: a voice or sound
gloss: [phrase] aloud, bleating, crackling, cry ([phrase] out), fame, lightness, lowing, noise, [phrase] hold peace, (pro-) claim, proclamation, [phrase] sing, sound, [phrase] spark, thunder(-ing), voice, [phrase] yell.

strongs_def: to whisper; by implication, to mumble aspell (as a magician)
gloss: charmer, whisper (together).

strongs_def: to join (literally or figuratively); specifically (by means of spells) to fascinate
gloss: charm(-er), be compact, couple (together), have fellowship with, heap up, join (self, together), league.

strongs_def: a society; also a spell
gloss: [phrase] charmer(-ing), company, enchantment, [idiom] wide.

strongs_def: to be wise (in mind, word or act)
gloss: [idiom] exceeding, teach wisdom, be (make self, shew self) wise, deal (never so) wisely, make wiser.

verses.english: Break their teeth, O God, in their mouth: break out the great teeth of the young lions, O LORD.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: to pull down or in pieces, break, destroy
gloss: beat down, break (down, through), destroy, overthrow, pluck down, pull down, ruin, throw down, [idiom] utterly.

strongs_def: a tooth (as sharp); specifically  ivory; figuratively, a cliff
gloss: crag, [idiom] forefront, ivory, [idiom] sharp, tooth.

strongs_def: the mouth (as the means of blowing), whether literal or figurative (particularly speech); specifically edge, portion or side; adverbially (with preposition) according to
gloss: accord(-ing as, -ing to), after, appointment, assent, collar, command(-ment), [idiom] eat, edge, end, entry, [phrase] file, hole, [idiom] in, mind, mouth, part, portion, [idiom] (should) say(-ing), sentence, skirt, sound, speech, [idiom] spoken, talk, tenor, [idiom] to, [phrase] two-edged, wish, word.

strongs_def: a grinder, i.e. back tooth
gloss: great tooth.

strongs_def: a village (as covered in by walls); also a young lion (perhaps as covered with a mane)
gloss: (young) lion, village. Compare H3723 (כָּפָר).

strongs_def: to tear down
gloss: beat down, break down (out), cast down, destroy, overthrow, pull down, throw down.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

verses.english: Let them melt away as waters which run continually: when he bendeth his bow to shoot his arrows, let them be as cut in pieces.

strongs_def: to spurn; also (intransitively) to disappear
gloss: abhor, cast away (off), contemn, despise, disdain, (become) loathe(some), melt away, refuse, reject, reprobate, [idiom] utterly, vile person.

strongs_def: a form of the prefix 'k-', but used separately  as, thus, so
gloss: according to, (such) as (it were, well as), in comparison of, like (as, to, unto), thus, when, worth.

derivation: dual of a primitive noun (but used in a singular sense);
strongs_def: water; figuratively, juice; by euphemism, urine, semen
gloss: [phrase] piss, wasting, water(-ing, (-course, -flood, -spring)).

derivation: akin to H3212 (יָלַךְ); a primitive root;
strongs_def: to walk (in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively)
gloss: (all) along, apace, behave (self), come, (on) continually, be conversant, depart, [phrase] be eased, enter, exercise (self), [phrase] follow, forth, forward, get, go (about, abroad, along, away, forward, on, out, up and down), [phrase] greater, grow, be wont to haunt, lead, march, [idiom] more and more, move (self), needs, on, pass (away), be at the point, quite, run (along), [phrase] send, speedily, spread, still, surely, [phrase] tale-bearer, [phrase] travel(-ler), walk (abroad, on, to and fro, up and down, to places), wander, wax, (way-) faring man, [idiom] be weak, whirl.

strongs_def: to tread; by implication, to walk; also to string abow (by treading on it in bending)
gloss: archer, bend, come, draw, go (over), guide, lead (forth), thresh, tread (down), walk.

derivation: from H2686 (חָצַץ); also by interchange for H6086 (עֵץ)
strongs_def: properly, a piercer, i.e. an arrow; by implication, a wound; figuratively, (of God) thunderbolt; the shaft of aspear
gloss: [phrase] archer, arrow, dart, shaft, staff, wound.

derivation: from H2686 (חָצַץ); also by interchange for H6086 (עֵץ)
strongs_def: properly, a piercer, i.e. an arrow; by implication, a wound; figuratively, (of God) thunderbolt; the shaft of aspear
gloss: [phrase] archer, arrow, dart, shaft, staff, wound.

strongs_def: a form of the prefix 'k-', but used separately  as, thus, so
gloss: according to, (such) as (it were, well as), in comparison of, like (as, to, unto), thus, when, worth.

strongs_def: to cut short, i.e. curtail (specifically the prepuce, i.e. to circumcise); by implication, to blunt; figuratively, to destroy
gloss: circumcise(-ing), selves), cut down (in pieces), destroy, [idiom] must needs.

verses.english: As a snail which melteth, let every one of them pass away: like the untimely birth of a woman, that they may not see the sun.

strongs_def: a form of the prefix 'k-', but used separately  as, thus, so
gloss: according to, (such) as (it were, well as), in comparison of, like (as, to, unto), thus, when, worth.

strongs_def: a snail (as if floating in its own slime)
gloss: snail.

strongs_def: liquefaction, i.e. disappearance
gloss: melt.

derivation: akin to H3212 (יָלַךְ); a primitive root;
strongs_def: to walk (in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively)
gloss: (all) along, apace, behave (self), come, (on) continually, be conversant, depart, [phrase] be eased, enter, exercise (self), [phrase] follow, forth, forward, get, go (about, abroad, along, away, forward, on, out, up and down), [phrase] greater, grow, be wont to haunt, lead, march, [idiom] more and more, move (self), needs, on, pass (away), be at the point, quite, run (along), [phrase] send, speedily, spread, still, surely, [phrase] tale-bearer, [phrase] travel(-ler), walk (abroad, on, to and fro, up and down, to places), wander, wax, (way-) faring man, [idiom] be weak, whirl.

strongs_def: something fallen, i.e. an abortion
gloss: untimely birth.

derivation: feminine of H376 (אִישׁ) or H582 (אֱנוֹשׁ); irregular plural, נָשִׁים;(used in the same wide sense as H582 (אֱנוֹשׁ))
strongs_def: a woman
gloss: (adulter) ess, each, every, female, [idiom] many, [phrase] none, one, [phrase] together, wife, woman. Often unexpressed in English.

strongs_def: properly, a failure; by implication nothing; usually (adverb) not at all; also lest
gloss: lest, neither, no, none (that...), not (any), nothing.

strongs_def: to gaze at; mentally to perceive, contemplate (with pleasure); specifically, to have avision of
gloss: behold, look, prophesy, provide, see.

derivation: from an unused root meaning to be brilliant;
strongs_def: the sun; by implication, the east; figuratively, a ray, i.e. (architectural) a notched battlement
gloss: [phrase] east side(-ward), sun (rising), [phrase] west(-ward), window. See also H1053 (בֵּית שֶׁמֶשׁ).

verses.english: Before your pots can feel the thorns, he shall take them away as with a whirlwind, both living, and in his wrath.

derivation: from an unused root apparently meaning to interrupt or suspend;
strongs_def: properly, non-occurrence; used adverbially, not yet or before
gloss: before, ere, not yet.

strongs_def: to separate mentally (or distinguish), i.e.(generally) understand
gloss: attend, consider, be cunning, diligently, direct, discern, eloquent, feel, inform, instruct, have intelligence, know, look well to, mark, perceive, be prudent, regard, (can) skill(-full), teach, think, (cause, make to, get, give, have) understand(-ing), view, (deal) wise(-ly, man).

derivation: or (feminine) סִירָה; or סִרָה; (Jeremiah 52:18), from a primitive root meaning to boil up;
strongs_def: a pot; also a thorn (as springing up rapidly); by implication, a hook
gloss: caldron, fishhook, pan, (wash-)pot, thorn.

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to pierce or make fast;
strongs_def: a thorn-tree (especially the buckthorn)
gloss: Atad, bramble, thorn.

strongs_def: a form of the prefix 'k-', but used separately  as, thus, so
gloss: according to, (such) as (it were, well as), in comparison of, like (as, to, unto), thus, when, worth.

strongs_def: alive; hence, raw (flesh); fresh (plant, water, year), strong; also (as noun, especially in the feminine singular and masculine plural) life (or living thing), whether literally or figuratively
gloss: [phrase] age, alive, appetite, (wild) beast, company, congregation, life(-time), live(-ly), living (creature, thing), maintenance, [phrase] merry, multitude, [phrase] (be) old, quick, raw, running, springing, troop.

strongs_def: a form of the prefix 'k-', but used separately  as, thus, so
gloss: according to, (such) as (it were, well as), in comparison of, like (as, to, unto), thus, when, worth.

strongs_def: a burning of anger
gloss: sore displeasure, fierce(-ness), fury, (fierce) wrath(-ful).

strongs_def: to storm; by implication, to shiver, i.e. fear
gloss: be (horribly) afraid, fear, hurl as a storm, be tempestuous, come like (take away as with) a whirlwind.

verses.english: The righteous shall rejoice when he seeth the vengeance: he shall wash his feet in the blood of the wicked.

strongs_def: probably to brighten up, i.e. (figuratively) be (causatively, make) blithe or gleesome
gloss: cheer up, be (make) glad, (have, make) joy(-ful), be (make) merry, (cause to, make to) rejoice, [idiom] very.

strongs_def: just
gloss: just, lawful, righteous (man).

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

strongs_def: to gaze at; mentally to perceive, contemplate (with pleasure); specifically, to have avision of
gloss: behold, look, prophesy, provide, see.

strongs_def: revenge
gloss: [phrase] avenged, quarrel, vengeance.

strongs_def: a stroke, literally or figuratively (in various applications, as follow)
gloss: anvil, corner, foot(-step), going, (hundred-) fold, [idiom] now, (this) [phrase] once, order, rank, step, [phrase] thrice, (often-), second, this, two) time(-s), twice, wheel.

strongs_def: to lave (the whole or a part of a thing)
gloss: bathe (self), wash (self).

strongs_def: blood (as that which when shed causes death) of man or an animal; by analogy, the juice of the grape; figuratively (especially in the plural) bloodshed (i.e. drops of blood)
gloss: blood(-y, -guiltiness, (-thirsty), [phrase] innocent.

strongs_def: morally wrong; concretely, an (actively) bad person
gloss: [phrase] condemned, guilty, ungodly, wicked (man), that did wrong.

verses.english: So that a man shall say, Verily there is a reward for the righteous: verily he is a God that judgeth in the earth.

strongs_def: to say (used with great latitude)
gloss: answer, appoint, avouch, bid, boast self, call, certify, challenge, charge, [phrase] (at the, give) command(-ment), commune, consider, declare, demand, [idiom] desire, determine, [idiom] expressly, [idiom] indeed, [idiom] intend, name, [idiom] plainly, promise, publish, report, require, say, speak (against, of), [idiom] still, [idiom] suppose, talk, tell, term, [idiom] that is, [idiom] think, use (speech), utter, [idiom] verily, [idiom] yet.

strongs_def: ruddy i.e. a human being (an individual or the species, mankind, etc.)
gloss: [idiom] another, [phrase] hypocrite, [phrase] common sort, [idiom] low, man (mean, of low degree), person.

strongs_def: a particle of affirmation, surely; hence (by limitation) only
gloss: also, in any wise, at least, but, certainly, even, howbeit, nevertheless, notwithstanding, only, save, surely, of a surety, truly, verily, [phrase] wherefore, yet (but).

strongs_def: fruit (literally or figuratively)
gloss: bough, (first-)fruit(-ful), reward.

strongs_def: just
gloss: just, lawful, righteous (man).

strongs_def: a particle of affirmation, surely; hence (by limitation) only
gloss: also, in any wise, at least, but, certainly, even, howbeit, nevertheless, notwithstanding, only, save, surely, of a surety, truly, verily, [phrase] wherefore, yet (but).

derivation: perhaps from an unused root meaning to stand out, or exist; entity; used adverbially or as a copula for the substantive verb (H1961 (הָיָה));
strongs_def: there is or are (or any other form of the verb to be, as may suit the connection)
gloss: (there) are, (he, it, shall, there, there may, there shall, there should) be, thou do, had, hast, (which) hath, (I, shalt, that) have, (he, it, there) is, substance, it (there) was, (there) were, ye will, thou wilt, wouldest.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: to judge, i.e. pronounce sentence (for or against); by implication, to vindicate or punish; by extenssion, to govern; passively, to litigate (literally or figuratively)
gloss: [phrase] avenge, [idiom] that condemn, contend, defend, execute (judgment), (be a) judge(-ment), [idiom] needs, plead, reason, rule.

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to be firm;

gloss: [idiom] common, country, earth, field, ground, land, [idiom] natins, way, [phrase] wilderness, world.
